org.apache.james.protocols.api

Interface ProtocolSession

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IMAPSession, POP3Session, SMTPSession
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    POP3SessionImpl, ProtocolSessionImpl, SMTPSessionImpl

    public interface ProtocolSession
    Session for a protocol. Every new connection generates a new session

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  ProtocolSession.State 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Object getAttachment(String key, ProtocolSession.State state)
      Return the value which is stored for the given key in the specified ProtocolSession.State or null if non was stored before.

    • Method Detail

      • getLogger

        Logger getLogger()
        Gets the context sensitive log for this session.
        Returns:
        log, not null

      • setAttachment

        Object setAttachment(String key,
                   Object value,
                   ProtocolSession.State state)
        Store the given value with the given key in the specified ProtocolSession.State. If you want to remove a value you need to use null as value
        Parameters:
        key - the key under which the value should get stored
        value - the value which will get stored under the given key or null if you want to remove any value which is stored under the key
        state - the ProtocolSession.State to which the mapping belongs
        Returns:
        oldValue the value which was stored before for this key or null if non was stored before.

      • getAttachment

        Object getAttachment(String key,
                   ProtocolSession.State state)
        Return the value which is stored for the given key in the specified ProtocolSession.State or null if non was stored before.
        Parameters:
        key - the key under which the value should be searched
        state - the ProtocolSession.State in which the value was stored for the key
        Returns:
        value the stored value for the key

      • getState

        @Deprecated
Map<String,Object> getState()
        Deprecated. use setAttachment(String, Object, State)
        Return Map which can be used to store objects within a session
        Returns:
        state

      • getConnectionState

        @Deprecated
Map<String,Object> getConnectionState()
        Deprecated. use getAttachment(String, State)
        Returns Map that consists of the state of the ProtocolSession per connection
        Returns:
        map of the current ProtocolSession state per connection

      • resetState

        void resetState()
        Reset the state

      • getRemoteAddress

        InetSocketAddress getRemoteAddress()
        Return the InetSocketAddress of the remote peer
        Returns:
        address

        InetSocketAddress getLocalAddress()
        Return the InetSocketAddress of the local bound address
        Returns:

      • getSessionID

        String getSessionID()
        Return the ID for the session
        Returns:
        id

      • newLineTooLongResponse

        Response newLineTooLongResponse()
        Define a response object to be used as reply for a too long input line
        Returns:
        Response or null if no response should be written before closing the connection

      • newFatalErrorResponse

        Response newFatalErrorResponse()
        Define a response object to be used as reply during a fatal error. Connection will be closed after this response.
        Returns:
        Response or null if no response should be written before closing the connection

      • getUser

        String getUser()
        Returns the user name associated with this interaction.
        Returns:
        the user name

      • setUser

        void setUser(String user)
        Sets the user name associated with this interaction.
        Parameters:
        user - the user name

      • isStartTLSSupported

        boolean isStartTLSSupported()
        Return true if StartTLS is supported by the configuration
        Returns:
        supported

      • isTLSStarted

        boolean isTLSStarted()
        Return true if the starttls was started
        Returns:
        true

      • getConfiguration

        ProtocolConfiguration getConfiguration()
        Return the ProtocolConfiguration
        Returns:
        config

      • getCharset

        Charset getCharset()
        Return the Charset which is used by the ProtocolSession
        Returns:
        charset

      • getLineDelimiter

        String getLineDelimiter()
        Return the line delimiter which is used
        Returns:
